resources.string: Vision: To be the prevailing centralised coordinating organisation for all food donations and play a key role in the reduction of food wastage within the whole supply chain.

Mission: To bridge potential donors and members. To provide access to and knowledge of cheaper sources of food for members.To look at ways to reduce food wastage by giving food a new lease of life through creative and alternative ways.
Afsara Jahin Rafi, Institute Of Information Technology, Jahangrnagar University.
Rahman Masuk Orpon, Institute Of Information Technology, Jahangrnagar University.
Fahim Alam Nirzhar, Institute Of Information Technology, Jahangrnagar University.
